Posts.Content: RCraig wrote: My mother in law is trying to make a decision to get chemo or not and the Adjuvantonline.com website is down for some reason. Does anyone know another reputable source for up to date numbers on survival statistics or have any idea why adjuvant is down? She's trying to make a life changing decision and it's so difficult without knowing the stats. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Adjuvant Website down any advice? RCraig RCraig

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2015 05:58AM RCraig wrote: Thanks for the info =) I've been on lifemath but it doesn't give an option for Herceptin which is very important since she is Her2 Positive and would be taking Herceptin. When I went to the predict site it only shows a .5% difference in survival rate with the addition of Herceptin. The doctor keeps throwing numbers around like 20% increase survival rate with Herceptin so I don't know if the website is wrong or the doctor is just exaggerating. It's like there is so much info but none of it aligns.
Posts.Title: Adjuvant Website down any advice? RCraig RCraig
